price: 28. Wana ezali mpo balandaki maye Allah aboyaki, mpe bazalaki na ntina ya kondima yango te, тре misala mia bango mibebisamaki.
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمُ ٱتَّبَعُواْ مَآ أَسۡخَطَ ٱللَّهَ وَكَرِهُواْ رِضۡوَٰنَهُۥ فَأَحۡبَطَ أَعۡمَٰلَهُمۡ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: dhālika bi-annahumu ittabaʿū mā askhaṭa al-laha wakarihū riḍ'wānahu fa-aḥbaṭa aʿmālahum
